title.rendered: Top 7 Kotlin App Development Companies To Make Android App – A Real Bonanza

content.rendered:
“ According to the annual JVM survey, Kotlin is now the second most popular programming language on the JVM” and most preferred programming language for Android.”

For that, nothing comes first when it comes to JVM-compatible cross-platform language statically typed programming language with reference. 

In recent years, KOTLIN has gained popularity like any other language with type inference. The rising popularity of Kotlin application development makes it the most popular JVM language.

According to insights.dice- Kotlin is used 96% for new projects and 36% for applications migrated from Java to Kotlin. 

The good thing is that you can directly use it with  Java code to make it more efficient, and it works concurrently or without issues.

The reason people are using this because of the higher interoperability with Java. But the job is not done here. You can hire top Kotlin App developers for dedicated service and make a considerable difference in android app development projects.

Reasons company Choose Over Kotlin.

  • Concise and Functional Codes
  • Failure detection mechanism
  •  Reduced cost and development time
  •  Higher Interoperability with Java
  •  Enhanced User Experience

It has tremendous benefits in a no. of ways. If you want to upgrade, then perhaps this is the best language you can use. The best thing about custom Android app development is that it has zero hassles to shift Java code to Kotlin and mix Kotlin and Java codes in a single project.

So by all understanding, if you want an app for business, nothing could be better than Kotlin, then you can hire dedicated Kotlin programmers to kick-start app development projects.

Though you’ll see no. of options, there are limited options :

  • In-house development
  • Outsourcing Project
